attributes.action: Put pressure on the US government to introduce common sense gun laws
attributes.additional_details:
- over 200 school shootings since Sandy Hook
- 21 school shootings since 2018
- 1606 mass shootings since Sandy Hook
- 80,000 Americans murdered by guns since Sandy Hook
- 0 gun control legislation passed
attributes.background: The US government contiuously fails to introduce common sense gun laws in order to protect it’s people, and yet nothing is done by other countries. A lack of gun laws does not only affect US citizens - it affects others from around the globe. The UK needs to show the US the necessity of gun laws.
